Child.DescriptionString: This app needs your permission to access the album.
This app needs your permission to access the camera.
This app needs your permission to access the microphone.
This app needs your permission to access the location.
This app needs your permission to access the location during use.
This app needs your permission to always access the location.
This app needs your permission to access the calendar.
This app needs your permission to issue reminders.
This app needs your permission to access sports and fitness.
This app needs your permission to access health updates.
This app needs your permission to access health sharing.
This app needs your permission to access Bluetooth.
This app needs your permission to access the media database.
